server_prefs.password_reset_message_browser: If your account was found, an email has been sent to you. Follow the email's instructions. The email's link will expire in 10 minutes.
server_prefs.password_reset_message_browser_bad: If your account was found, an email has been sent to you. Follow the email's instructions. The email's link will expire in 10 minutes.
server_prefs.password_reset_message:
Your password reset can be completed by clicking the following URL.

{url}

This link will expire in 10 minutes.
server_prefs.search_db_insert: INSERT INTO SEARCH_INFO (ITEM_PATH, ITEM_TYPE, ITEM_SIZE, ITEM_MODIFIED, ITEM_KEYWORDS) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
server_prefs.stats_get_transfers_sessions: select * from TRANSFERS where SESSION_RID in (%sessions%)
server_prefs.stats_get_sessions_time: SELECT RID FROM SESSIONS WHERE START_TIME < ?

server_list_subitem.display: ftp://lookup/ ( SSL TLS ) is running, 0 users connected. Connections Processed : 0
http://lookup:8080/ ( Web, WebDAV) is running, 0 users connected. Connections Processed : 0
http://lookup:9090/ ( Web, WebDAV) is running, 0 users connected. Connections Processed : 0
https://lookup/ ( Web, WebDAV SSL ) is running, 0 users connected. Connections Processed : 0
sftp://lookup:2222/ ( SSH ) is running, 0 users connected. Connections Processed : 0

server_prefs.web404Text: The selected resource was not found.
server_prefs.stats_get_transfers_period: select sum(TRANSFER_SIZE) from TRANSFERS t, SESSIONS s where DIRECTION = ? and (IGNORE_SIZE = 'N' or IGNORE_SIZE is null) and t.SESSION_RID = s.RID and USER_NAME = ? and t.START_TIME >= ?
server_prefs.search_db_delete: DELETE FROM SEARCH_INFO WHERE ITEM_PATH LIKE ?
server_prefs.stats_get_meta_info: select * from META_INFO where LOCATE(UPPER(ITEM_VALUE), UPPER(?)) > 0
server_prefs.stats_insert_sessions: INSERT INTO SESSIONS (RID, SESSION, SERVER_GROUP, USER_NAME, START_TIME, END_TIME, SUCCESS_LOGIN, IP) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
server_prefs.stats_get_transfers_count_period: select count(TRANSFER_SIZE) from TRANSFERS t, SESSIONS s where DIRECTION = ? and (IGNORE_SIZE = 'N' or IGNORE_SIZE is null) and t.SESSION_RID = s.RID and USER_NAME = ? and t.START_TIME >= ?
server_prefs.stats_insert_transfers: INSERT INTO TRANSFERS (RID, SESSION_RID, START_TIME, DIRECTION, PATH, FILE_NAME, URL, SPEED, TRANSFER_SIZE, IGNORE_SIZE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,?,'N')
server_prefs.stats_get_session_rid_sessions: select RID from SESSIONS where START_TIME > ? and USER_NAME = ?
server_prefs.stats_get_transfers_time: SELECT RID FROM TRANSFERS WHERE START_TIME < ?
server_prefs.logging_db_query: select LOG_DATA,LOG_MILLIS,LOG_ROW_NUM from CRUSHFTP_LOG where LOG_ROW_NUM >= ? and LOG_ROW_NUM <= ? order by LOG_ROW_NUM
server_prefs.syncs_insert_journal: INSERT INTO FILE_JOURNAL (RID, SYNC_ID, ITEM_PATH, EVENT_TYPE, EVENT_TIME, CLIENTID, PRIOR_MD5) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?,?,?)
server_prefs.stats_get_transfers_download: select count(*) from TRANSFERS where direction = 'DOWNLOAD' and session_rid in (select rid from SESSIONS where user_name = ?)
server_prefs.stats_update_transfers_ignore_size: update TRANSFERS set IGNORE_SIZE = 'Y' where SESSION_RID in (%sessions%) and START_TIME > ?
server_prefs.stats_update_sessions: UPDATE SESSIONS set END_TIME = ? where RID = ?

plugins_subitem_subitem.acl_groups_command: cmd /c dsquery user -samid {username} | dsget user -memberof -expand | dsget group -samid

plugins_subitem_subitem.db_user_query: select * from users where userName=? and userPass=? and (expireDate is null or expireDate > ?)
plugins_subitem_subitem.db_expired_user_query: select * from users where (expireDate is not null and expireDate < ?)
plugins_subitem_subitem.db_quota_query: update directories set quotaBytes = ? where id = ? and dirFTPPath = ? and dirName = ?

plugins_subitem_subitem.email_body: Your account has been created. Your username is:%user% Your password is:%pass%

plugins_subitem_subitem.findBad: Sorry, but you do not have permission to view this content.

server_prefs.search_db_query: SELECT * FROM SEARCH_INFO WHERE ITEM_PATH LIKE ?

sqlItems.db_modified_query: SELECT * FROM MODIFIED_TIMES WHERE SERVER_GROUP=? AND PROP_NAME=?
sqlItems.db_groups_query: SELECT * FROM GROUPS G, USERS U WHERE G.USERID = U.USERID AND G.SERVER_GROUP=?
sqlItems.db_user_email_query: SELECT USERNAME FROM USERS LEFT JOIN USER_PROPERTIES ON USERS.USERID = USER_PROPERTIES.USERID WHERE SERVER_GROUP = ? AND PROP_NAME = 'email' AND PROP_VALUE = ?
sqlItems.db_user_update: UPDATE USERS SET USERNAME=?, PASSWORD=? WHERE UPPER(USERNAME)=UPPER(?) AND SERVER_GROUP=?
sqlItems.db_user_delete: DELETE FROM USERS WHERE UPPER(USERNAME)=UPPER(?) AND SERVER_GROUP=?
sqlItems.db_modified_delete: DELETE FROM MODIFIED_TIMES WHERE SERVER_GROUP=? AND PROP_NAME=?
sqlItems.db_user_query: SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE SERVER_GROUP=? and UPPER(USERNAME)=UPPER(?)
sqlItems.db_groups_insert: INSERT INTO GROUPS (GROUPNAME, USERID, SERVER_GROUP) VALUES(?,?,?)
sqlItems.db_users_query: SELECT * FROM USERS WHERE SERVER_GROUP=? order by USERNAME

server_prefs.stats_insert_meta_info: INSERT INTO META_INFO (RID, SESSION_RID, TRANSFER_RID, ITEM_KEY, ITEM_VALUE) VALUES (?,?,?,?,?)
server_prefs.syncs_get_journal: select * from FILE_JOURNAL where SYNC_ID = ? and RID > ? and (CLIENTID <> ? or CLIENTID is null) order by RID
server_prefs.search_db_update: UPDATE SEARCH_INFO SET ITEM_SIZE = ?, ITEM_MODIFIED = ?, ITEM_KEYWORDS = ? WHERE ITEM_PATH = ?
server_prefs.stats_delete_meta_transfers: DELETE FROM META_INFO WHERE TRANSFER_RID IN (%transfers%)
server_prefs.emailReminderBodyText:
Your password is : %user_pass%
Requested from IP:%user_ip%
